org.xchain.framework.util

Class LruCacheMap<T,S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<K,V>
        • java.util.LinkedHashMap<T,S>
          • org.xchain.framework.util.LruCacheMap<T,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The class to key upon.
    S - The data class.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<T,S>

    public class LruCacheMap<T,S>
extends java.util.LinkedHashMap<T,S>
    A least recently used cache map. When adding a new entry to this map, if the number of entries exceeds the configured maximum size then the eldest entry will be dropped.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble, Devon Tackett, Josh Kennedy
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
